abstract: Thousands of opposition supporters attend rally calling for Kosovo government to resign, accusing it of violating Constitution in reaching agreements with Serbia and Montenegro that give more ethnic power to Serbs.
snippet: Thousands of opposition supporters called for the government to resign Wednesday, accusing it of violating the Constitution in deals with Serbia and Montenegro.
lead_paragraph: Thousands of opposition supporters called for the government to resign Wednesday, accusing it of violating the Constitution in deals with Serbia and Montenegro.
